Summary: viewed craft right above sister inlaws house.
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out side for a smoke. As always i looked up to see the stars and saw a craft flying slowly directly overhead. there was no sound, the only light was the light from the stree lights etc. reflecting off the craft. As soon as I saw it I yelled inside for my relatives to come see. The only one to get out in time was my son. He saw the craft but not in the detail I did when it was right over head. I really want to know what this thing was. This is a heavily populated area. there must have been other witnesses who also seen this.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hatboro
There were no other sightings in Hatboro on or around December 24th 2011
